title: Leah Allyne Princess of Veldure: The Discovery of Self
description: Every girl dreams of being a princess. A princess from another planet, though; not so much. Ever since Riya can remember she's been plagued by bad dreams about being chased by beings that can't exist...or can they? On an unforgettable morning the truth is revealed and she learns that her life on Earth was just a cover for her true purpose. Now, she must learn to deal with life, love, loss and discovering her true identity all while keeping herself, and those she loves, safe in an effort to return home and claim her throne!
author: J.C.  Rudolph
